status.Description: Show an overview of the current project

rollout.Description: Manage a Kubernetes deployment or OpenShift deployment config

rollback.Description: Revert part of an application back to a previous deployment

cancel-build.Description: Cancel running, pending, or new builds

import-image.Description: Import images from a container image registry

tag.Description: Tag existing images into image streams

create.Description: Create a resource from a file or from stdin

apply.Description: Apply a configuration to a resource by filename or stdin

describe.Description: Show details of a specific resource or group of resources

edit.Description: Edit a resource on the server

set.Description: Commands that help set specific features on objects

label.Description: Update the labels on a resource

annotate.Description: Update the annotations on a resource

expose.Description: Expose a replicated application as a service or route

delete.Description: Delete resources by filenames, stdin, resources and names, or by resources and label selector

scale.Description: Set a new size for a Deployment, ReplicaSet or Replication Controller

autoscale.Description: Autoscale a deployment config, deployment, replica set, stateful set, or replication controller

serviceaccounts.Description: Manage service accounts in your project

logs.Description: Print the logs for a container in a pod

rsh.Description: Start a shell session in a container

rsync.Description: Copy files between a local file system and a pod

port-forward.Description: Forward one or more local ports to a pod

debug.Description: Launch a new instance of a pod for debugging

exec.Description: Execute a command in a container

proxy.Description: Run a proxy to the Kubernetes API server

run.Description: Run a particular image on the cluster

cp.Description: Copy files and directories to and from containers

wait.Description: Experimental Wait for a specific condition on one or many resources

replace.Description: Replace a resource by filename or stdin

process.Description: Process a template into list of resources

extract.Description: Extract secrets or config maps to disk

observe.Description: Observe changes to resources and react to them (experimental)

registry.Description: Commands for working with the registry

api-versions.Description: Print the supported API versions on the server, in the form of group/version

api-resources.Description: Print the supported API resources on the server

diff.Description: Diff live version against would-be applied version

kustomize.Description: Build a kustomization target from a directory or URL

whoami.Description: Return information about the current session

completion.Description: Output shell completion code for the specified shell (bash or zsh)

plugin.Description: Provides utilities for interacting with plugins

version.Description: Print the client and server version information
